text.1: Draw your surrendered to your will rendered.
text.2: Your surrendered will run like a gazelle,
text.3: He will bow before your splendor.
text.4: For to him, your love is sweeter,
text.5: Than the dripping honeycomb, and any taste at all.
text.6: Resplendent, beautiful, radiance of the world,
text.7: My soul is sick for your amore,
text.8: Please, O God, heal her now,
text.9: By the beauty of your radiance, by showing her.
text.10: Then she will be strong, she will be healed,
text.11: And she will be your handmaiden forever more.
text.12: Ancient one, rouse, please, your mercy.
text.13: Please, on your beloved son, have pity,
text.14: For so much has this yearning been,
text.15: To see your strength, in its beauty,
text.16: Please, my god, the love of my heart,
text.17: Hurry, please, and do not remain hidden.
text.18: Please, be revealed and spread the covering, beloved,
text.19: Upon me, the shelter of your tranquility
text.20: Illuminate the earth with your nobility
text.21: We will rejoice in you, we will be in festivity
text.22: Hurry, beloved, for the time has come,
text.23: And be good to me, like days long ago.
